clues.text:
2022:
Captain Pete Mitchell is back in the cockpit

2015:
A new theme park creates Indominus rex, a genetically modified dinosaur

2009:
This first "Transformers" sequel was No. 1 in domestic box office for the year

2010:
Jeff Bridges & Bruce Boxleitner reprise their roles in a digital world

2020:
Detectives played by Will Smith & Martin Lawrence fight drug lords in Miami

Inside the name Somalia, you can find this other conflict-plagued land to the west

2 of the 3 countries that carry the nation of Guinea within their own names
clues.response: (2 of) Papua New Guinea, Guinea-Bissau & Equatorial Guinea

rounds.text: "Love" is within the titles of 3 of his most famous books; a fourth, "The Rainbow", calls love "the flower of life"
